actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: Resolution to recommend that the Board on Geographic Names approve a proposal to name two mountains in Alaska after the late Congressmen Hale Boggs and Nick Begich.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Board on Geographic Names approve the proposal to name two mountain peaks near Whittier, Alaska, after deceased Congressmen Boggs and Begich.

titles.title: Resolution to recommend that the Board on Geographic Names approve a proposal to name two mountains in Alaska after the late Congressmen Hale Boggs and Nick Begich.
